TEXT_DICT.This: Contains pairs of Strings, used to get values based on keys.

TEXT: The first #yInfusion each combat draws #b1 additional card.
The first #b%d #yInfusions each combat draws #b1 additional card.
The first time you #yInfuse each turn, reduce the cost of all #yCatalysts in hand by #b2.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse each turn, reduce the cost of all #yCatalysts in hand by #b2.
The first time you #yInfuse each combat, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse each combat, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.
The first time you #yInfuse each combat, apply #b2 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse each combat, apply #b2 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
The first time you #yInfuse Terra and Aqua in the same turn, prevent the next time you would lose HP.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse Terra and Aqua in the same turn, prevent the next time you would lose HP.
The first time you #yInfuse Ignis and Aer each turn, put the lowest cost Attack from your draw pile into your hand.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse Ignis and Aer each turn, put the lowest cost Attack from your draw pile into your hand.
The first time you #yInfuse Terra and Aqua in the same turn, create a copy of the lowest cost Skill in your hand.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse Terra and Aqua in the same turn, create a copy of the lowest cost Skill in your hand.
The first time you #yInfuse each turn, #yInfuse Aqua.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse each turn, #yInfuse Aqua.
When #yInfused, increase the effects of #yIgnis by #b%d until its next #yInfusion.
When #yInfused, increase the effects of #yTerra by #b%d until its next #yInfusion.
The first time you #yInfuse each turn, gain #yVigor equal to the total #yBase of the cards drawn.
The first #b%d times you #yInfuse each turn, gain #yVigor equal to the total #yBase of the cards drawn.
